products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-iam-access-group
products.label: Access Management
products.short_description: Creates and configures IAM access groups
products.long_description: This architecture supports creating a preconfigured set of access groups and adding users, service IDs, and trusted profiles to the access groups.

features.title: Configures IAM access groups
features.description: Configures IAM access groups to provide a default set of access policies and assign users to the groups.

products.support_details: This product is in the community registry, as such support is handled through the originated repo. If you experience issues please open an issue in that repository [https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-iam-access-group/issues](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-iam-access-group/issues). Please note this product is not supported via the IBM Cloud Support Center.

profiles.profile_name: IBM Cloud Framework for Financial Services

architecture.descriptions: Configures IAM access groups to provide a default set of access policies and assign users to the groups.

diagrams.description: Configures IAM access groups to provide a default set of access policies and assign users to the groups.
